item.description:
Hey Everyone!

If you are looking for something to do, come and join me at my niece's  Jack & Jill.

There will be KARAOKE put on by DJ Captain Chris, door prizes, raffles, food and more!

The tickets are $20 for a single ticket or $25 for two! So, please bring some friends. Tickets can be purchased the night of the event. I hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Jack'n Jill for my niece
